mapper.select: SELECT u.id AS id, u.username AS username, u.`password` as 'password', u.dept_id as 'deptId', u.email, u.tenant_id as 'tenantId', u.avatar as 'avatar', u.super_admin as 'superAdmin', u.`status` as 'status' FROM sys_user AS u WHERE u.username = #{username}
